{"id":1097652313,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 3 days","timestamp":1699851769,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"38 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1097652313/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sort Vowels in a String","memory":"12.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isVowel(char c){\n        return c=='A' || c=='a' || c=='E' || c=='e' || c=='I' || c=='i' || c=='O' || c=='o' || c=='U' || c=='u';\n    }\n    string sortVowels(string s) {\n        int n=s.length(),v_idx=0;\n        vector<char> vowels;\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)\n        if(isVowel(s[i])){\n            vowels.push_back(s[i]);\n            s[i]='*';\n        }\n        sort(vowels.begin(),vowels.end());\n        for(int i=0;i<n;i++) if(s[i]=='*') s[i]=vowels[v_idx++];\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sort-vowels-in-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
